member.summary: Process text asynchronously with streaming.

member.name: T:FlashTokenizer.BasicTokenizer
member.summary: Basic text preprocessing for BERT: cleaning, whitespace splitting, Chinese char spacing, punctuation split.

member.name: T:FlashTokenizer.BasicTokenizerOptimized
member.summary: High-performance span-based BasicTokenizer with zero allocations in hot paths.

member.summary: Tokenize with early stopping and zero allocations in hot path.

member.summary: GPT-2 style Byte Pair Encoding (byte-level) tokenizer with regex pre-tokenization.

member.summary: Create BPE tokenizer from vocab.json and merges.txt.

member.name: T:FlashTokenizer.FlashTokenizer
member.summary: Public facade for WordPiece/BERT tokenization, ready for app consumption.

member.summary: Create a tokenizer using provided options.
member.param: Path to vocab.txt. If null, defaults to sample/vocab.txt.

member.name: M:FlashTokenizer.FlashTokenizer.#ctor(FlashTokenizer.TokenizerOptions)
member.summary: Create a tokenizer using a TokenizerOptions object.

member.name: T:FlashTokenizer.ITokenizer
member.summary: Simple tokenizer abstraction to support multiple algorithms (e.g., WordPiece, BPE).

member.name: M:FlashTokenizer.ITokenizer.Encode(System.String)
member.summary: Encode input text to token ids.

member.name: M:FlashTokenizer.ITokenizer.Decode(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Decode token ids back to text.

member.name: T:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring the tokenizer behavior.

member.name: P:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerOptions.VocabPath
member.summary: Path to vocab.txt (BERT WordPiece) or equivalent file.

member.name: P:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerOptions.DoLowerCase
member.summary: Whether to lowercase and strip accents (as in original BERT-uncased).

member.name: P:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerOptions.ModelMaxLength
member.summary: Maximum sequence length; -1 means unlimited.

member.name: P:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerOptions.EnableBidirectional
member.summary: Use bidirectional WordPiece fallback heuristic.

member.name: P:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerOptions.Type
member.summary: Select tokenizer algorithm. Default: Bert.

member.name: P:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerOptions.BpeVocabJsonPath
member.summary: Path to BPE vocab.json (for GPT-2 style BPE).

member.name: P:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerOptions.BpeMergesPath
member.summary: Path to BPE merges.txt (for GPT-2 style BPE).

member.name: T:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerType
member.summary: Tokenizer algorithm selection.

member.name: F:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerType.Bert
member.summary: BERT WordPiece tokenizer.

member.name: F:FlashTokenizer.TokenizerType.BPE
member.summary: GPT-2 style BPE tokenizer.

member.name: T:FlashTokenizer.WordpieceTokenizer
member.summary: WordPiece tokenizer core using initial and suffix tries for fast matching.

member.name: M:FlashTokenizer.WordpieceTokenizer.TokenizerIdsUtf8(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: Zero-copy UTF-8 path: consumes a UTF-8 byte span directly.
